comment: Michael, are you a child, or do you just act that way on the Internet? Supposing that American Jew's are in any way associated with Jew's in their native land (Israel), is so ignorant as to call into question your sanity. Judaism in America is in no way a reflection of that in Israel. In America it has taken the least path of resistance, and gone full leftist.
